sources.title: Momotaro no umiwashi (1943)
sources.description: Momotarō no Umiwashi (桃太郎の海鷲, literally Momotarō’s Sea Eagles) is an animated Japanese propaganda film produced in 1942 by Geijutsu Eigasha and released March 25, 1943. Momotaro sends a sneak aircraft attack to sink the ships of Demon Island, using his animal companions as crew members and pilots. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/momotaro-no-umiwashi-1943/
